resources.string: Play alarm sound, display a notification and pop up on screen
Go and scan Your QR Code!
QRAlarm needs an “Alarms & reminders” special app access to schedule alarms that can be fired at exact times. The access is revoked and thus must be granted via system settings.
QRAlarm needs access to Your phone’s camera in order to scan for QR Codes to disable alarms. Without this permission the app can not work properly.
Camera permission has been permanently revoked. Without it QRAlarm can not work properly. In order to fix it, go to settings and allow QRAlarm to use phone’s camera.
